mapper.insert: insert into reservation(reservationid, spaceid, companyid, memberid, startdate, enddate, status, paystatus, price, prepay, reserve_time, imp_uid, prepay_uid, postpay_uid) values(seq_reservation.nextval,#{spaceId},#{companyId},#{memberId},#{startDate}, #{endDate}, 001, #{payStatus}, #{price}, #{prepay},TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{imp_uid}, #{prepay_uid} , #{postpay_uid})
mapper.select: select reservationid from reservation where #{startDate} <= enddate and #{endDate} >= startdate and spaceid = #{spaceId} and status = 001
select (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') - TO_DATE(reserve_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'))*24 from reservation where reservationid=#{reservationId}
mapper.update: update reservation set status = '002', paystatus=#{payStatus} where reservationid=#{reservationId}
mapper.select: select * from reservation where companyid = #{companyId} order by reservationid desc
